Bio_Welcome: Welcome to Klod Tattoo: where art is not just observed... it's worn.
Bio_Paragraph1: Every line, every shadow, and every detail comes from a vision carefully crafted just for you. I don't create "standard" tattoos: every project is a unique masterpiece, designed to tell your story with style, strength, and elegance.
Bio_Education: My training started at Art High School and was perfected at the Fine Arts Institute, where I transformed drawing into a true aesthetic discipline.
Bio_Paragraph2: This academic foundation, combined with years of field experience, allows me to blend technical precision and artistic sensitivity in every piece of work.
Bio_Quote:
"At Klod Tattoo you don't get a tattoo:
you receive a work of art created to accompany you forever."
Style_Realistic_Description: Portraits and photographic details with surgical precision.
Style_Traditional_Description: Bold lines and vibrant colors of the Old School tradition.
Style_Blackwork_Description: Strong contrasts, geometries, and designs with strong visual impact.
Reviews_Subtitle: Our clients' satisfaction is our priority
Review1_Text: "Klod is an incredible artist. He immediately understood what I wanted and the result exceeded expectations. Very clean studio."
Review2_Text: "Top professionalism. I felt comfortable right away. The tattoo healed perfectly following his advice."
Review3_Text: "Very light hand and surgical precision. I will definitely be back for the next piece!"
CTA_Subtitle: Book a free consultation now and start your artistic journey
Footer_Description: Professional tattoo studio in Obernburg am Main. Art on skin since 2015. Specialized in realistic, traditional and blackwork.
Services_Subtitle: Quality and professionalism in every detail
Services_Custom_Description: Personalized designs created especially for you
Services_CoverUp_Description: Transform old tattoos into new works of art
Services_Restoration_Description: Restore the beauty of your faded tattoos
Services_Consultation_Description: Discuss your idea with our artist
Contacts_Subtitle: Come visit us or contact us
